usernames.title: Usernames
usernames.description: List of users you want to scrape.

keywords.title: Keywords
keywords.description: List of query terms you want to search by, and then scrape the tracks.

urls.title: URLs
urls.description: List of valid SoundCloud URLs either to a user page, or a query page.

maxComments.title: Maximum Comments (0 -> No Comments)
maxComments.description: How many comments on each track do you want to scrape? (Max 300)

maxQueryResults.title: Maximum Query Results (Ignore if not scraping by keywords)
maxQueryResults.description: How many results do you want for each keyword search? (Max 2000)

clientId.title: client_id
clientId.description: SoundCloud API Client ID (Leave empty to use default)
